entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain mixed with ice pellets ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
